channel.title: Comments on: Smoke It If You Got It

item.title: By: Week in review (Part 5) at buttonmashing.com
item.dc:creator: Week in review (Part 5) at buttonmashing.com
item.description: [...] I like reading AFK Gamer, I like reading the current goings-on over at World of Warcraft. I like reading because ever since I swore of MMOGs (Neocron being my last foray) I’ve been pining to return to the fold and WoW seems so appropriate for me since I love Blizzard games (I logged countless Diablo 2 hours). I still can’t do it, but when he posts funny stuff like this, it makes me want to go back. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] I like reading AFK Gamer, I like reading the current goings-on over at World of Warcraft. I like reading because ever since I swore of MMOGs (Neocron being my last foray) I’ve been pining to return to the fold and WoW seems so appropriate for me since I love Blizzard games (I logged countless Diablo 2 hours). I still can’t do it, but when he posts funny stuff like this, it makes me want to go back. […]

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description: That's some great stuff. The lead some strong baddies into town is definitely a classic. I've sworn MMOGs off but I love reading your stuff. WoW sure looks like the crack pipe everyone says it is. If you don't mind, I'll just get a contact buzz here.
item.content:encoded: That’s some great stuff. The lead some strong baddies into town is definitely a classic. I’ve sworn MMOGs off but I love reading your stuff. WoW sure looks like the crack pipe everyone says it is. If you don’t mind, I’ll just get a contact buzz here.
